summary: Defines a set of abstract base classes that standardize how Prefect blocks represent external resources such as credentials, databases, jobs, notifications, object storage, and secrets, providing common interfaces, client creation, logging, and execution monitoring.
business_intent: Provide a reusable framework for developers to build secure, observable, and interchangeable blocks that integrate external services into Prefect workflows, simplifying authentication, data access, job orchestration, alerting, and secret management.
